dominiccobo.gameoflife.model

Class Save

  • java.lang.Object
    • dominiccobo.gameoflife.model.Save

  • public class Save
extends java.lang.Object

    Class creates an ArrayList saver, adapted to work with the iterations saved by this program.

    Since:
    March 2017
    Author:
    Dominic Cobo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String fname
      Instance variable detailing the filename + path of the content to be saved.
      private GridIterator gridIterator
      Instance variable detailing the grid iterator to retrieve the content that requires saving.
      private java.util.ResourceBundle outputStr
      Loads resource bundle containing all output strings, this is separate from the normal view strings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Save(GridIterator gridIterator)
      Constructor for the Save class, specifies the grid iterator of which to retrieve the saveable content from.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFile(java.lang.String fname)
      Method specifies the filename and directory where it should be saved.
      void write()
      Method takes the content saved in the iterator array list and outputs it to the requested directory.
